name: habitat-suitability-model-02_download_presences
label: Habitat Suitability Model - 02 Download Presences
description:
In this script, the study area is defined and the occurrences
# of a species of choice inside this area are downloaded together with an overview 
# of the datasets.

inputs.name: input
inputs.label: input
inputs.description: zip file containing the setup information, temporal_extent and study_area_file

outputs.name: output
outputs.label: output zip
outputs.description: zip file containing the RDS files with the occurrences of the species in the study area, the overview of datasets and the study area
